description: List all authorized Slack workspaces connected to the AWS Account onboarded with AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: SlackWorkspaces
nested_items.description: A list of Slack workspaces registered with AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: SlackTeamId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Slack workspace authorized with AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: SlackTeamName
nested_items.description: The name of the Slack workspace.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Either ENABLED or DISABLED. The resource returns DISABLED if the organization's AWS Chatbot policy has explicitly denied that configuration. For example, if Amazon Chime is disabled.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: Provided if State is DISABLED. Provides context as to why the resource is disabled.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An optional token returned from a prior request. Use this token for pagination of results from this action. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only results beyond the token, up to the value specified by MaxResults.
